Name: Aurum Kings
About the game: Aurum Kings is a competitive arena game where the goal is to become the richest in the land! Collect Gold Gain gold while you hold the crown, or pick it up throughout the time spent in each level! The first player to reach the set amount of gold wins!! Cause Chaos Use your chosen ability to give you the edge in each match, blowing others into lava pits, or stunning them with a bear trap! Unique Environments Each map is different, with a new environmental mechanic! Fast-Paced gameplay The enemy has victory in the sights, gloating about far ahead they are compared to everyone else when suddenly, BOOM! They get pushed into a corner by a bomb, trapped, you take the crown from them and dive away, making an epic comeback for the victory.
